a frequently parodied Donald Rumsfeld response to a reporter's question about whether there actually was evidence of any link between title="Saddam Hussein" href="http://www.chicagotribune.com/topic/arts-culture/saddam-hussein-PEHST000983.topic"> Saddam Hussein and terrorists seeking weapons of mass destruction. The Defense secretary responded: Reports that say that something hasn't happened are always interesting to me because, as we know, there are known knowns; there are things we know we know. We also know there are known unknowns; that is to say we know there are some things we do not know. But there are also unknown unknowns- the ones we don't know we don't know.
